text: Portrait of Imogen is a 1988 American short documentary film about American photographer Imogen Cunningham, directed by Meg Partridge, daughter of Cunningham's son Rondal Partridge. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * * *Portrait of Imogen at the Imogen Cunningham Trust Category:1988 films Category:1988 short films Category:1988 documentary films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:English-language films Category:American independent films Category:Documentary films about photographers Category:Short documentary films
title: Portrait of Imogen
